definition: exorcising God/God who drives away plague and evil spirits

sentences.english: Both of them have deep relations with the "Nuo"dance in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它们与古傩都有着深远的源流关系。

sentences.english: In Guizhou province there exist three types of the Nuo opera in three different regions.
sentences.chinese: 贵州傩文化主要表现在傩戏的演出中。

sentences.english: We should implement systematical marketing and elastic price strategy of big XiangXi exorcism Culture.
sentences.chinese: 实施大湘西傩文化一体化营销策略和灵活性定价策略。

sentences.english: The Tan Song prefer to have inherited a wreck and Tracy married.
sentences.chinese: 而傩送宁肯继承一条破船也要与翠翠成婚。

sentences.english: But Nuo is not entertaining play, but an "ritual play", as is called by some drama theorist.
sentences.chinese: 傩又被称为“仪式性戏剧”，是一种信仰仪式。

definition: exorcising God/God who drives away plague and evil spirits
shaman among the Yi ethnic group
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
Tonggu county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
see 仡佬族[Ge1 lao3 zu2], Gelao or Klau ethnic group of Guizhou/Taiwan pr. [Qi4]
to offer sacrifices to the gods
(old barbarian dialects) to pay a fine in atonement/river/Taiwan pr. [tan4]
